scripts.install-mac-x86_64: cargo clean;npx cargo-cp-artifact -a cdylib dtln-rs index.node -- cargo build -p dtln-rs --lib --release --message-format=json-render-diagnostics --target x86_64-apple-darwin; cp dtln.node.js dtln.js
scripts.install-mac-arm64: cargo clean;npx cargo-cp-artifact -a cdylib dtln-rs index.node -- cargo build -p dtln-rs --lib --release --message-format=json-render-diagnostics --target aarch64-apple-darwin; cp dtln.node.js dtln.js
scripts.install-native: f() { if [[ "$TARGET_ARCH" == "x64" ]]; then npm run install-mac-x86_64; else npm run install-mac-arm64; fi }; f
